title: Uncomfortable Q & A With Steve Saka
itunes:title: Uncomfortable Q & A With Steve Saka
description:
LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage… We welcome owner and founder of Dunbarton Tobacco and Trust – Steve Saka as we get uncomfortable with some tough Questions & Answers as we put him on the hot seat. We fire up a cigar from the care package prime in the first hour; Aging Room Pura Cepa.

In the second hour we are joined via remote by Michael Cappelini of Toscano Cigars as we find out what's going on in Italy. Plus he shares with us an incredible deal that we will have the details on during his interview. We will light up an unbanded cigar, what will it be?

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH
